title: Target with Four Faces
medium: Encaustic on newspaper and cloth over canvas surmounted by four tinted-plaster faces in wood box with hinged front
dimensions: Overall, with box open, 33 5/8 x 26 x 3" (85.3 x 66 x 7.6 cm); canvas 26 x 26" (66 x 66 cm); box (closed) 3 3/4 x 26 x 3 1/2" (9.5 x 66 x 8.8 cm)
credits: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Robert C. Scull
